This folder contains the original Files for the Axiris IV-3 clock.

Author: Axiris
Source: Axiris IV-3 Arduino Shield clock example (Elektor, around 2015)
License: Public domain (as stated in the original file header)

This code was NOT written by me (Erik Lauter). It is included here only as
third-party reference code to document the original implementation for the
Axiris IV-3 hardware.

All ESP32-S3 related code, NTP integration, Wi-Fi and web configuration logic
in this repository is separate and authored by Erik Lauter.
